document.full_text: in alameda county, refuge is the sole emergency group-home shelter for emotionally disturbed teenagers, but according to state documents and former employees, it is anything but a safe haven.
document.title: unclear oversight yields repeated violations at home for troubled youth
lines_and_colors: in alameda county, refuge is the sole emergency group-home shelter for emotionally disturbed teenagers, but according to state documents and former employees, it is anything but a safe haven.
